TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataBindingHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供資料繫結處理常式的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for a data-binding handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供資料繫結處理常式的基底類別。 provides a base class for data-binding handlers. 資料繫結處理常式可以用設計工具中，來執行以啟用有意義的設計介面上的控制項顯示資料繫結。A data-binding handler can be used within a designer to perform data-binding to enable a meaningful display of the control on the design surface. 通常是控制項的設計工具會負責這項功能。Typically a control's designer is responsible for this functionality. 不過，當控制項不是即時的設計介面上，例如在另一個控制項的範本，它並沒有設計工具，以及如果其中一個指定的資料繫結處理常式提供此功能中控制項的程式碼.However, when a control is not live on the design surface, such as within the template of another control, it does not have a designer, and this functionality is provided by a data-binding handler if one has been specified with a in the code for the control. 若要使用的資料繫結處理常式，其中包含資料繫結屬性的控制項必須有其表示的資料繫結使用的處理常式類型的程式碼中指定。To use a data-binding handler, the control which has the data-bound property or properties must have a specified within its code that indicates the type of data-binding handler to use. 例如，與相關聯控制項類別透過中的程式碼類別。For example, the control is associated with the class through a in the code for the class. 在範本內、其 text 屬性已資料繫結的控制項的標籤上就會顯示字"資料繫結 」。Within a template for a , a control whose text property has been data bound displays the word "DataBound" on the label. 不使用資料繫結處理常式中，標籤會是不可見，在設計階段，因為它並沒有設計工具在設計階段繫結其樣板化控制項中的資料繫結屬性。Without the data-binding handler, the label would be invisible at design-time, as it does not have a designer to bind its data-bound properties while in a templated control at design-time. 若要實作資料繫結處理常式，定義新的類別衍生自這個類別並實作方法，以設定適當的屬性。To implement a data-binding handler, define a new class that derives from this class and implement the method to set the appropriate properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DataBindControl(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
public: abstract void DataBindControl(System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerHost ^ designerHost, System::Web::UI::Control ^ control);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該以提供自訂的資料繫結處理常式的功能在衍生類別中實作這個方法。This method should be implemented in a derived class to provide functionality to a custom data-binding handler. 資料繫結邏輯應該實作這個方法中，內，而且可以是特定的資料繫結處理常式所繫結的屬性或屬性的類型。The logic for the data binding should be implemented within this method, and can be specific to the type or types that the data-binding handler is to bind a property or properties on.

para.span: 大部分的資料繫結處理常式將會需要檢查資料繫結集合的控制項上，使用介面，以判斷任何特定的屬性，它可以處理是否繫結的資料。

span.span: Most data binding handlers will need to examine the data bindings collection on the control, using the interface, to determine if any specific properties it can handle are data-bound.
